amendment.description: To allow the Secretary of the Interior to enter into memoranda of understanding for the purpose of scientific and technical cooperation in the mapping of critical minerals and rare earth elements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3712 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3712 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Coons to Amendment SA 3748. To allow the Secretary of the Interior to enter into memoranda of understanding for the purpose of scientific and technical cooperation in the mapping of critical minerals and rare earth elements.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3712 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Coons to Amendment SA 3748.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3712 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
